attributes.action: to expel foriegn nationals granted British status who commit acts of terriorism in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Where British Citizenship has been granted to a foriegn national and a serious crime later is committed by that foriegn national, then in addition to British punishment the person should lose their British status and will be require to return to the Country of origion.
